# Cerebrum Biology Academy
> Best NEET Biology Coaching in Delhi NCR | AIIMS Faculty | 98% Success Rate

## About
Cerebrum Biology Academy is India's premier NEET Biology coaching institute, founded by Dr. Shekhar C Singh (AIIMS Delhi alumnus). Established in 2014, we specialize exclusively in Biology for NEET-UG aspirants with a 98% success rate and 680+ selections.

## YouTube Channels
YouTube Channel (Personal): https://www.youtube.com/@drshekharcsingh - Dr. Shekhar C Singh's personal NEET Biology lectures
YouTube Channel (Academy): https://www.youtube.com/@cerebrumbiologyacademy - Cerebrum Biology Academy official channel

## Key Facts
- Founded: 2014
- Founder: Dr. Shekhar C Singh (AIIMS Delhi alumnus, 15+ years teaching experience)
- Specialization: NEET Biology Coaching (Botany, Zoology, Human Physiology, Genetics, Ecology)
- Success Rate: 98% (students scoring 600+ in NEET)
- Students Selected: 680+ into AIIMS, JIPMER, top GMCs
- Centers: 6 locations across Delhi NCR
- Batch Size: Maximum 15 students (personalized attention)
- Mode: Offline + Online (pan-India)

## Centers
1. South Extension (Flagship) — Block D, South Extension Part 2, New Delhi 110049
2. Rohini — 211 Vikas Surya Tower, DC Chauk, Sector 9, Delhi 110085
3. Green Park — B 113 FF Gulmohar Park, New Delhi 110049
4. Gurugram — Unit 17, M2K Corporate Park, Mayfield Garden, Sector 51, Gurugram 122018
5. Faridabad — Sector 17, Faridabad 121002
6. Noida — B-45, Sector 62, Noida 201301

## Courses
- NEET Foundation (Class 9-10): Early start biology preparation
- NEET Comprehensive (Class 11): 2-year structured program
- NEET Target (Class 12): 1-year intensive course
- NEET Dropper Batch: Year-long program for NEET repeaters
- NEET Crash Course: 45-day intensive revision before exam
- Weekend Batches: For school-going students
- Online Classes: Pan-India access with live sessions

## Pricing
- Range: Rs 45,000 to Rs 1,56,000 per year depending on program
- EMI options available (0% interest)
- Scholarship programs for meritorious students
